channel.title: Monsters/bosses/npc....you know :)
channel.description:
ok, ive seen people saying this is how you add items and blah blah blah
but i want to know how to add npc, can anybody tell me how to?
Also my tok jad isnt dropping what i want him to drop, he/she? isnt on the item2.java file so i added him on but still not dropping, ive been on npcdrops.cfg and changed that but still no. can anyone help me with this aswell?
Thanks much, -------ImJammy780-------
